item.title: Spotify daily top 200 songs
item.description: On this article I will explore the following dataset available on kaggle: Spotify daily top 200 songs with genres 2017-2021 It contains information on the daily top 200 tracks listened to by users of the Spotify digital platform around the world. Here a quick glance at the data as is: Position Track.Name Artist Streams Date Genre 1 Starboy The Weeknd 3135625 2017-01-01 [‘canadian pop’, ‘canadian contemporary r&b’, ‘pop’] 2 Closer The Chainsmokers 3015525 2017-01-01 [‘pop’, ‘pop dance’, ‘tropical house’, ‘edm’, ‘electropop’, ‘dance pop’] 3 Let Me Love You DJ Snake 2545384 2017-01-01 [‘pop’, ‘electronic trap’, ‘dance pop’, ‘edm’, ‘pop dance’, ‘pop rap’] 4 Rockabye (feat.
